Articles.Content:
Good Morning Everyone,

I found Kerbal a few months ago thanks to my brother, and after ten mins on the demo got hooked and bought the game. So wanted to say I love the game, and after in a long while so I finally decided to drag myself to the forums and get signed up.

ONE OF US, ONE OF US!

Just joking. Welcome! Everyone around here is really friendly, so you shouldn't have any trouble getting around.
Welcome aboard EonthePeon. If you have any questions, there are heaps of nice people here to help, aswell as numerous tutorials you can find here on the forums, Good luck.
